joint_involvement.justification: polyarthrite rhumatoïde (status: confirmed) mentions extensive involvement of both large and small joints

serology.justification: Positive RF (value: 87 UI/mL) and positive anti-CCP (value: 67 U/mL), qualifying for 3 points per marker

acute_phase.justification: CRP value is above the threshold of >10 mg/L

duration.justification: No explicit mention of duration in provided facts

treatment_context.justification: Presence of methotrexate (MTX) and acide folique, both category csDMARD

classification_rationale: Based on the ACR/EULAR criteria, the patient meets the threshold for RA+, with a score of 7 out of 9. The presence of a conventional synthetic DMARD (methotrexate) further strengthens this conclusion.
